description: Provinceton - NON Strata Row home on quiet street, walking distance to schools, parks, & future Sky Train station. Beautifully maintained home with open spacious layout, features a 4th bedroom & bathroom in basement, for your teenager. Private back yard/patio area to enjoy your morning coffee. Single garage with 2nd parking pad off back lane. Make a secure investment in this fantastic location & not endure endless strata fees & levies. Call for your private tour. Please give at least 24hrs notice for viewings. NO sign on property.
